appearance: Silvery or dark surface streak and in exceptional cases black discolorations.
cause:
1.Damage to plastic melt due to excessively high temperatures or long residence times resulting in gaseous decomposition of product.
2.High shear heating due to small gate cross sections or by sharp changes of direction in the mold.
correction:
1.Reduce injection speed.
2.Avoid undersized gates and sharp changes in direction (shear intensive areas) in the mold.
3.Check the controller of the hot runner system and the barrel heater.
4.Reduce melt temperature, screw speed (rpm), residence time (if necessary use a smaller plasticizing unit) and back pressure.
